message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $12500? This would still give you a significant benefit and allows me to get closer to my desired price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to consider $11500? This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.
